automation_yaml:
id: 'morning_office_living_room_lights_0600'
alias: Morning Office and Living Room Lights at 6 AM
description: "At 6:00 AM every day, turn on the Office WLED to 50% and Living Room light to 30%."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time
    at: '06:00:00'
conditions: []
action:
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness_pct: 50
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 30
